page.title: 05HOUSES AROUND STACKSTEADS
page.content: We have been going round asking people questions about housing because we are carrying out a project.We have asked 112 people and that is almost all our school.Most of the people live in semidetatched houses, most of which are council houses. The second most popular is terraced. Most of the houses around here are built out of stone especially old ones.Up Fernhill Drive some new houses are being built. The new houses are being built out of pebbledash .The houses made out of pebbledash are to make them look fancy .Five people live on farms and there are 46 people live in a semidetached house and thirtyfive people live in houses called Quasisemi.
